body:
If you create the waves.oct file from the "scene2" directory with the
following command:
   oconv -f art_mat.rad waves.rad >waves.oct
This problem goes away. Otherwise, rpict gets confused as to where the
files waves.oct was built from are located.
  oconv art_lib/art_mat.rad art_lib/waves.rad >art_lib/waves.oct
run from the "scene2" directory also works.




Randolph M. Fritz, Lighting Design and Simulation
+1 206 390 4477 || rmfritz3 at gmail.com <rmfritz3 at panix.com>
